𒆦 court 𓊖 in 𒆠𒁲 𒀠 kiʳdiᵃˡ 𒂦𒆦 bad₃ kisal "courtyard"

𒆦 #kisal Kursaal court-hall square ≈ 𒆤 KIT.hall

𒆦 court ≈ 𒆤 KIT ≈ 𒆤 GEᵈ 𓊀 gate < guard 𒆍 káᵗ 口 kǒu < house

𒆦 ≈ 𒂷·𒋰 ≈ 𒄑·𒉌 gu.nu ( simplified form more complicated!) ≈ 𒃤

𒆦 gunû ≠ 𒃲 gal

𒀾 ⋍ 𒑓 ⋍ 𒆦 see gunû ligature marker

𒄑𒆦 geš giparₓ KISAL "cloister" <> Giebel? Saal?

𒅊 IGI-gunû : green (eye) 𒅆𒆦

𒍝 ZA, LIMMU5 (rare form of numeral four “4”
𒇹 limmu2 [1759x] | NIGIDA LIMMU (frequent form of “4”

𒐘 four GEŠ2
𒐏 four U
